commenter_a: Remember when Hillary Clinton said the 50,000 emails she kept from the State Department (in violation of the Federal Records Act) were about yoga and her daughter's wedding? How many of the most recent set of 14,900 emails ordered made public by a federal court are about yoga or her daughter's wedding? I'm thinking zero. But hey: pertinent falsehoods under oath aren't criminal when you're aspiring to become the First Woman President (TM).
